attributes.long-description:
Rediscover Halloween in this adventure/role-playing game from Tim Schafer's Double Fine Productions. Collect magical costumes, powerful upgrades and special items as you hunt down quests. Battle the evil overlords in this epic adventure to rescue your kidnapped sibling and save Halloween!

• Exploration Mode: Trick-or-treat through the Auburn Pines suburbs, Autumn Haven Mall and the village of Fall Valley collecting candy, battle stamps, creepy treat cards and other hidden treasures.
• Combat Mode: Transform into colossal size warriors to take down evil monsters in traditional, turn-based RPG style.
• Magical Costumes: Dress up as a Knight, Ninja, Unicorn, Vampire, Robot and more, each with a unique special ability!
• Quest Notebook: Reference quest objectives and inventory items in your trusty notebook to track progress and loot.
